article_title: J-Mac joins RazorSharks roster Sunday, helps defeat WNY Thundersnow
article_text:
The game also honoring former player and coach Keith Friel. His number 13 jersey was retired in a special ceremony at halftime.

This game ends the RazorSharks regular season, leaving them with a 18-2 season.

article_metadata.description: Greece Athena high school star Jason "J-Mac" McElwain joined the Rochester RazorSharks Sunday night as part of their line up!

This game ends the RazorSharks regular season, leaving them with a 18-2 season.
His number 13 jersey was retired in a special ceremony at halftime.
The game also honoring former player and coach Keith Friel.
